channel.title: mathematics on Aaron Trowbridge
channel.description: Recent content in mathematics on Aaron Trowbridge

item.title: risk neutrality: the equivalent martingale measure
item.description: an explanation of the risk-neutral measure, a result of Girsanov's theorem, commonly deployed by "sell-side" financial institutions to simplify derivative pricing

item.title: generative adversarial networks
item.description: a look at the theory behind the GAN model and an implementation in Julia using Flux.jl

item.title: Legendre transformations
item.description: a discussion of the Legendre transformation and its applications to physics

item.title: the central identity of quantum field theory
item.description: a derivation of a generating functional identity used for calculating correlators

item.title: the Heston stochastic volatility model
item.description: an overview of a relatively modern and sophisticated model for pricing financial derivatives

item.title: pseudovectors
item.description: a look a the properties of pseudovectors
